name: Alien Augmentation Device

items.alias: Alien Data Storage Crystal - Nano Technology
Translated Alien Data Storage Crystal - Combat

raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ All parts required for this process can be found in Sector 10 #L "Inactive Empty Alien Augmentation Device" "268493" #L "Inactive Alien Translation Device" "268477" #L "Alien Activation Crystal" "268478" #L "Alien Data Storage Crystal - Combat" "268479" or #L "Alien Data Storage Crystal - Nano Technology" "268480" or #L "Alien Data Storage Crystal - Defense" "268481" or #L "Alien Data Storage Crystal - Technical" "268482" or #L "Alien Data Storage Crystal - Medical" "268483" or #L "Alien Data Storage Crystal - Insight" "268484" or #L "Alien Data Storage Crystal - Protection" "268485" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Alien Activation Crystal + Inactive Alien Translation Device = #L "Alien Translation Device" "268476" Skills: | 450 ME | Alien Activation Crystal + Inactive Empty Alien Augmentation Device = #L "Empty Alien Augmentation Device" "268475" Skills: | 450 ME | #L "Alien Data Storage Crystal - Combat" "268479" + Alien Translation Device = #L "Translated Alien Data Storage Crystal - Combat" "268486" Skills: | 450 ME | Translated Alien Data Storage Crystal - Combat + Empty Alien Augmentation Device = #L "Alien Augmentation Device - Combat" "268467" Skills: | 450 ME & EE |
